mapper.select: select D.*, (select name from dept M where D.ref = M.key) as "refName" from dept D where key = #{ key }
select * from dept where key = #{ ref }
mapper.insert: insert into dept values( #{key}, #{ref}, #{name}, nvl((select dept_level from dept where key = #{ref}) + 1,1) )
mapper.update: update dept set key = #{key}, ref = #{ref}, name = #{name}, dept_level = nvl((select dept_level from dept where key = #{ref}) + 1,1) where key = #{key}
